findings.title: Excessively Integer Size
findings.description: Using oversized unsigned integer data type, resulting in higher transaction costs and longer execution times.

findings.title: Operator Optimization
findings.description: Optimizable code segments for smaller size and less memory consumption.

findings.title: Potential Subtraction Underflow
findings.description: Potential underflow subtraction that may cause the execution to revert.

findings.title: Code Repetition
findings.description: Repetitive code segments leading to issues like gas efficiency, complexity, readability, security, and maintainability.

findings.title: Percentage Calculation Inconsistency
findings.description: Inconsistent percentage calculation for public allocations leading to unpredictable user experience.

findings.title: Misleading Comment Messages
findings.description: Inaccurate comment messages making it difficult to understand the source code.

findings.title: Modifiers Usage
findings.description: Repetitive statements for precondition validation instead of using modifiers.

findings.title: Redundant Storage Writes
findings.description: Performing redundant storage writes without checking the current state of variables.

findings.title: Missing Events Emission
findings.description: Not emitting events for significant actions, making it difficult for external parties to track and monitor the activity.

findings.title: Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Not adhering to the Solidity style guide's naming conventions.

findings.title: Divide before Multiply Operation
findings.description: Performing divisions before multiplications may cause loss of precision.

findings.title: Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: Not properly checking for zero values in variable setters.

findings.title: Stable Compiler Version
findings.description: Not locking the Solidity version, which may lead to compatibility issues.
